txt.en: 'Much as I wish to be free of this dank place, we still have work to do.'
TBD - Blow up the northwestern tunnel
Speak to Igerna outside the cave
TBD - The ceiling collapses and the tunnel is blocked
'I heard the explosions from here! May that make them think twice about coming to the lands of Gondor.'

With a hefty supply of dangerously explosive barrels of black powder, you are ready to seal off some of the goblins' tunnels.\n\nYou should start with the south-western tunnel, in the cave in Pinnath Gelin.
Igerna has asked you to gather barrels of the goblins' black powder.\n\nBarrels can be found in the camp outside, as well as inside, the cave at Krauzhaf, in Pinnath Gelin.
